author: billbarker
msg: file build.xml was initially added on branch HEAD.

author: billbarker
msg: Remove dependency on URLClassLoader that was preventing running under 1.1

author: billbarker
msg: Allow the user to optionally configure to use the 1.1 loader even under Java2.

SimpleClassLoader should handle replaced jar files better than URLClassLoader.  This makes this an option for people that want jar reloading, and can live without enforcement of Java2 Manifest options.  Hopefully this gives the best of 3.2 and 3.3 for these people.
